title: Keira Knightley walks red carpet just weeks after giving birth
text:
Keira Knightley walks red carpet just weeks after giving birth (Picture: Getty Images)

Keira Knightley has thrown herself back into the spotlight just weeks after giving birth.

The actress, who is currently yet to share the tot’s name or gender, looked like a goddess as she walked the red carpet at the Official Secrets premiere, in London.

And despite getting straight back into work following her pregnancy, the 34-year-old remained in high spirits as she posed up a storm in front of the cameras.

Dressed in a white gown that was embellished with a lace overlay, the mother-of-two was glowing as she showed off her post-baby bod.

And she looked incredible.

She looked like a goddess (Picture: Getty Images)

Back in September, Keira was spotted pushing a pram as she enjoyed a stroll with her musician husband James Righton.

Even though the couple are yet to give up any details surrounding the little one, it was reported the proud dad might have revealed the name when gushing over his newborn at a party.

According to the Mail On Sunday, James was overheard telling his pals all about the bambino when attending a Hugo Boss yacht party.

And it’s claimed he referred to the little one as ‘Delilah’.

She was promoting her new film Official Secrets (Picture: WireImage)

The star and her hubby James Righton welcomed their second baby into the world (Picture: Getty Images)

The parents already share four-year-old daughter Evie, who they welcomed into the world two years after they wed in Vaucluse in the South of France.

Talking about parenting, the Love Actually star has recently called the blessing ‘f***ing difficult’ after her firstborn struggled to sleep through the night for three whole years.

She told People magazine: ‘I don’t think we give women enough credit for the physical and emotional marathon they go through when becoming a mother.

‘I come from a place of amazing privilege. I have an incredible support system. I’ve been unbelievably lucky in my career; I can afford good childcare.’

She added: ‘And yet I still find it really f**king difficult – doesn’t mean I don’t love my kid.’

Keira’s new film Official Secrets is out October 18.
